Text:
Prego, Sheron (: (; 

Nickyboy was right, it's a never ending season.  2 more episodes of GA have been added to the list. May 13th @ Maysville Slave House & May 27th @ Tooele Hospital.

It sure is a long season, I'm glad they have not taken a break though, there was a long wait between season 2 and 3 I think.thanks a lot for this as always. Awesome uploads. I look forward to My Ghost Story episode 5 when you get it, enjoying that a lot.

Thanks

http://www.travelchannel.com/TV_Shows/Ghost_Adventures/Episodes_Travel_Guides?tabSelect=Season&page=3

Anyone notice that Travel Channel's site has season 4 as only two episodes and now on season 5?
